cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
cancel.message: No worries, you can restart the purchase process at any time.
cancel.support: If you encounter any issues, please feel free to contact our customer service team.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Your purchase has been completed successfully
success.message: Thank you for your purchase! We have received your payment and the related services will be activated soon.
success.emailConfirmation: You will receive a confirmation email with your purchase details.

cancel.title: Subscription Cancelled
cancel.description: Your subscription process has been cancelled
cancel.message: No worries, you can resubscribe to our services at any time.
cancel.flexibleDescription: We offer flexible subscription options to meet your different needs

success.title: Subscription Successful!
success.message: Thank you for subscribing to our service! Your subscription has been activated and you can start using it immediately.
success.billingReminder: You will receive a reminder email before the next billing cycle
